about_the_game:
Experience the turn-based tactical combat in the age of samurai with the Sengoku: Shadow Strikers Combat Demo!

You will be given 7 samurai equipped with a variety of weapons, and tasked with the duty of eliminating the enemies that have taken control of a small farmhouse. Every playthrough will be slightly different, as player unit and enemy unit positioning will be randomized, as well as potential variety in enemies you may encounter.

The purpose of this game is to give you a taste of the combat that will be featured in Sengoku: Shadow Strikers, as well as gather your feedback to improve the game before we hit early access, so don't forget to join the Discussions on Steam!

short_description: Turn your clan into a Sengoku legend in this tactical RPG. Recruit and train warriors, shape alliances, conquer castles, and alter history through brutal turn-based battles. Influence the outcome of feudal Japan in Sengoku: Shadow Strikers.
